text: Itoupava Norte is a neighborhood of Blumenau, Santa Catarina, Brazil located on the left bank of the River Itajai-Açu. The principal streets are 2 de Setembro and Primeiro de Janeiro. A big part of this neighborhood is subject to flooding. Teka and Mogk are the most important plants in this place and Guarani Club is the most important club. Category:Neighbourhoods in Santa Catarina (state)
title: Itoupava Norte
